i really love these lashes and i thought i wouldnt because they are kinda thick and long but once i had them on i never went back i love the length and volume and now when i use other lashes i feel like something is missing they re well made and the strip where the hairs sit is sturdy which is good it allows u to out them on and they site well above ur lashes the flimsy once move and wiggle and make it harder for you to put on these are great and they are reusable to come off well and hold shape i have use mine about 5 times now  the hairs stay on havent ripped or shedded just yet but dont pulled like i did when glue got on the hairs cause it did rip off overall good lashes to have so pretty
get these now

profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

The user continues to prioritize hair care products focused on controlling frizz and flyaways for her kinky or coarse curly hair type, displaying a discerning interest in performance and reliability. She maintains a critical stance towards product effectiveness, reflecting her low to moderate ratings for items that fail to meet her standards. Recent feedback reveals a mix of satisfaction and constructive criticism with hair accessories, as illustrated by her recent experience with a wig that she found aesthetically pleasing but overly shiny and in need of adjustments for a more natural appearance. 

Her loyalty to brands remains conditional, swaying towards traditional solutions that deliver results. Yet, the user remains open to experimenting with beauty enhancements, as demonstrated by her positive experiences with false eyelashes that meet her expectations for ease of use and comfort. This shows her appreciation for high-quality products that bolster her beauty routine while ensuring a polished look.

Overall, the user seeks effective and reliable hair care and beauty solutions that combine strong hold and aesthetics, tailored to enhance her needs for a neat appearance while allowing for personal adjustments when necessary.
